p: A different study tested the activity of A. absinthium against several pathogens that cause Chagas disease, malaria, and leishmaniasis: Trypanosoma brucei and T. cruzi, Leishmania infantum and Plasmodium falciparum, respectively. Various concentrations of A. absinthium herb extract were tested against these protozoa. The extract showed low activity only against T. brucei [ 82].
